risk.views.ui

Class RiskMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JMenuBar
            • risk.views.ui.RiskMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public class RiskMenu
extends javax.swing.JMenuBar
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains a custom JMenu item to be added to the game view, extends JMenuBar
    Author:
    hcanta
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
